item.title: 1confirmation Founder: Ethereum's Institutional Holding Structure Healthier Than Bitcoin's
item.description: On August 24th, Nick Tomaino, who is the founder of the crypto venture capital firm 1confirmation, put up a message saying, "The crucial defect of Strategy is that Michael Saylor holds 10% of the company's equity but wields 45% of the voting rights. Meanwhile, the company holds 3.3% of the total Bitcoin supply. He shows up on TV every day as a 'Bitcoin spokesperson.' Clearly, Wall Street doesn't want him to become wealthier."In contrast, Tom Lee's stake is significantly smaller than Michael Saylor's. And companies like SBET, ETHZ, and GAME are making headway without anyone cornering the Ethereum holdings. This is precisely why Wall Street and the public will offer support to ETH in a manner distinct from BTC.

item.title: An whale transferred 12 million BIO to Binance 40 minutes ago, equivalent to around $3.79 million
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale address 0xe0ba deposited 12 million BIO tokens (valued at $3.79 million) into Binance 40 minutes ago. Previously, the whale received 4.8 million BIO tokens (worth $1.53 million) from the Vesting Wallet of Bio Protocol.Moreover, 5 months ago, when the price was $0.057, the whale withdrew 15 million BIO tokens from Binance. The current unrealized gain is $3.72 million (+436%).

item.title: A whale is currently 3x long on YZY with a floating profit of $2.12 million.
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale is currently 3 times long in YZY and has a floating profit of $2.12 million.

item.title: El Salvador Continues to DCA into Bitcoin: Accumulated an additional 7 BTC in the past 7 days, increasing total holdings to 6,278.18 BTC
item.description: On August 24th, based on the data from the website of the Salvadoran Ministry of Finance, in the past 7 days, El Salvador has accumulated an extra 7 Bitcoins. As a result, its total Bitcoin holdings have reached 6,278.18 Bitcoins, which is worth more than $719 million.

item.title: Michael Saylor re-releases Bitcoin Tracker information, hinting at additional BTC purchase
item.description: On August 24th, the founder of Strategy, Michael Saylor, once again provided information regarding the Bitcoin Tracker. He remarked, "Bitcoin is on Sale."It is noted that according to the previous pattern, Strategy always discloses information about increasing its holdings of Bitcoin on the second day following the release of such news.

item.title: A whale deposited 5.45 million USDC into HyperLiquid and went long on BTC, ETH, and other tokens.
item.description: On August 24th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale transferred 5.45 million USDC into HyperLiquid and took long positions on ETH (with a leverage of 20x), BTC (with a leverage of 40x), and also had leveraged long positions (with a leverage of 10x) on HYPE, LINK, AAVE, and MKR.

item.title: A whale deposited 15.47 million USDC into Hyperliquid and went long on BTC and BNB
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale with the address 0x31F9 deposited 15.47 million USDC into Hyperliquid to take a long position on BTC and BNB. Additionally, it bought SOL, ETH, LINK, and FARTCOIN.As of now, the whale has established a long position of 130.5 BTC (approximately $15 million), 1,714 BNB (approximately $1.47 million), purchased 18,044 SOL spot (approximately $3.7 million), placed buy orders for 1,073 ETH (approximately $5 million), 59,880 LINK (approximately $1.5 million), and 842,696 FARTCOIN (approximately $750,000).

item.title: A certain Bitcoin ancient whale has once again moved 6,000 BTC, used for rebalancing into ETH
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a certain Bitcoin ancient whale has once again transferred out 6,000 BTC (approximately $6.895 billion) to purchase ETH.As of the present moment, the whale has accumulated a total of 278,490 ETH (about $1.28 billion), with an average price of $4,585. It still holds a long position of 135,265 ETH (about $581 million).

item.title: Capybobo's Tokyo Debut, PYBOBO Limited Skin Outfit Highly Praised
item.description: August 24th. Catizen's global Web3 game Capybobo made its debut at the Tokyo LINE NEXT & BGW Festa. It delivered a keynote speech and shared its new endeavors in integrating gaming with trendy toys and facilitating online-offline interactions.At the event venue, the Capybobo booth presented a wide range of exquisite gifts from the Catizen ecosystem. Notably, the PYBOBO limited skin doll outfit paired with the Labubu figurine stood out as the highlight of the entire event, winning enthusiastic acclaim from the audience. Many players managed to obtain this special set at the event, truly experiencing the unique charm of integrating virtual creativity with physical trendy toys, which kept the event atmosphere vibrant and cheerful.

item.title: Billionaire Peter Thiel is Betting on Ethereum to Become Wall Street's Preferred RWA Blockchain
item.description: On August 24th, billionaire Peter Thiel is placing a bet that Ethereum will become the preferred platform for Real-World Assets (RWA) on Wall Street. His investment firm, Founders Fund, has made significant investments in Ethereum-related assets and has invested in multiple companies that hold Ethereum as a treasury reserve asset, such as ETHZilla and Bitmine. Peter Thiel's investment thesis for Ethereum is based on the notion that if Ethereum can serve as an alternative channel for settling USD, stocks, and other assets outside of the traditional financial system, then its native token will gain substantially from increased network activity.
